TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditableDesignerRegion extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion

summary.span: 表示關聯控制項之設計階段標記內的可編輯內容區域。

span.span: Represents an editable content region within the design-time markup for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，以協助您管理在設計階段的範本。Use the class to help manage templates at design time. A會使用此類別的執行個體其產生的區域內容的 HTML 標記的方法。A will use an instance of this class with its method to generate HTML markup of the region's content. ## Examples 此範例示範如何建立具有兩個可按區域的控制項和具有兩個檢視或範本物件。This example shows how to create a control with two clickable regions and an object with two views, or templates. 編譯專案，然後在視覺化設計工具中開啟頁面，並切換至設計檢視 (WYSIWYG)。Compile the project, then open the page in a visual designer and switch to design (WYSIWYG) view. 有兩個可點按的檢視， **View1**並**View2**。There are two clickable views, **View1** and **View2**. 按一下 **View1**並拖曳控制項的設計工具的空白區域，可按區域的正下方到頁面的下半部。Click **View1** and drag the control from the lower part of the page into the empty designer region just below the clickable regions. 按一下 **View2**並拖曳到空的設計工具區域的控制項。Click **View2** and drag the control into the empty designer region. 按一下 **View1**再次強調，以及要使用的區域隨即再度出現。Click **View1** again, and the region with the reappears. 按一下 **View2**和與區域隨即再度出現。Click **View2** and the region with the reappears. 若要查看如何將您的變更保存的 HTML 標記中的 [原始碼] 檢視中切換回Switch back to source view to see how your changes are persisted in the HTML markup > [!NOTE] > 您的專案必須 System.Design.dll 組件的參考。Your project must have a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly. [!code-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.aspx#8)]
